title: Jacqueline
description: Based on the Ray Johns mystery book, Inspector Martin is on the case to find out who murdered Jacqueline.
altHero: a woman lies dead on the floor
alt1: a mansion on a dark evening
alt2: a frightened woman runs down the stairs
alt3: the frightened woman screams, runs down a candlelit hallway
alt4: a gloved hand shoots a gun at a woman on the floor
